org.morphus.stereo

Interface Display

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StereoDisplay, VoidDisplay

    public interface Display
    Display is a proxy wrapper interface to access the actual 3D stereo display runtime environment: S3DView.
    Author:
    In Aikun Electronics., Ahmed Shakil
    Create Date
    12-09-2013

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Display.Layout
      Display layout type.
      static class  Display.RenderMode
      Display rendering mode.
      static class  Display.TnMode
      TN barrier mode.
